name: Shivu
greetingText: My luv, my future wife and my everything!
wishText: Wishing u very very Happy Valentines day!! I really really wanted to make this day special by being there by your side. But, very sooooon i will be!! Thank you for coming into my life and filling the missing peice of my heart! Luv u loads!! Miss u more & more as the day come close to holding u tight in my arms!!!!
